name: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn C programming, including syntax, data types, and basic programming concepts.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore key algorithmic concepts, problem-solving, and algorithm analysis techniques in this course.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master C++ basics for Data Structures and Algorithms with practical coding examples.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Get a solid grasp of essential data structures, including arrays, linked lists, and trees.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Learn Python's Object-Oriented Programming principles with practical applications and illustrative examples.

name: Software Engineering
details: Comprehensive software engineering process, from requirements gathering to testing and deployment.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and the fundamentals of cloud computing infrastructure.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: Discover MySQL databases, including SQL queries, database design, and data management.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Boost problem-solving skills with challenging coding problems and algorithmic thinking exercises.
